A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A good movie needs more then a pretty picture with light sabers and space ships. It needs interesting characters with relevant plot lines that have depth. Besides Kylo Ren and maybe Rey\, no one else is interesting and the plots lines are literally pointless. The big twists turn out to be that they aren't big twists\, and the director decides to just redo the light verse dark side again. Nothing new.
